General.Name: Trillion Energy International Inc.
General.Description: Trillion Energy International Inc. operates as an oil and gas exploration and production company with assets in Turkey and Bulgaria. It owns 49% interests in the SASB natural gas field covering an area of 12,387 hectares; 19.6% ownership interest in the Cendere oil field; and 50% operating interest in the Bakuk gas field located near the Syrian border. The company was formerly known as Park Place Energy Inc. and changed its name to Trillion Energy International Inc. in April 2019. Trillion Energy International Inc. was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 838 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 0A6
